title: Malin Akerman is leggy in patterned two-piece with Jack Donnelly at Living With Yourself premiere
text:
They will celebrate their first wedding anniversary in December.

And on Wednesday night, Malin Akerman and Jack Donnelly were a picture perfect couple at the Los Angeles premiere for Netflix series Living With Yourself.

The actress, 41, and the actor, 33, posed for photos with their arms around each other.

Date night: Malin Akerman and Jack Donnelly were a picture perfect couple at the Los Angeles premiere for Netflix series Living With Yourself on Wednesday night

Akerman went for a leggy look with a patterned blouse tucked into a matching mini skirt.

She went bare-legged in shiny black heels and carried a black and gold box clutch.

The Swedish-born actress, who was most recently seen in the Showtime series Billions, wore her blonde hair styled back from her face.

British actor Connelly opted for a blue two-piece suit which he paired with a black top and black and white sneakers.

The couple announced their engagement in October, 2017, and tied the knot in Tulum Mexico the following year.

Prior to her romance with Connolly, Akerman was married to Italian musician Roberto Zincone with whom she shares a son Sebastian born in 2013.

Akerman recently wrapped filming on the Netflix film The Sleepover with Joe Manganiello.

She and Connelly will be seen on the big screen together next year in the comedy Friendsgiving with Kat Dennings, Jane Seymour, Christine Taylor, Wanda Sykes and Margaret Cho.
